member.name: T:unvell.D2DLib.D2DCapStyle
member.summary: From D2D1_CAP_STYLE.

member.name: F:unvell.D2DLib.D2DCapStyle.Flat
member.summary: Flat line cap.

member.name: F:unvell.D2DLib.D2DCapStyle.Square
member.summary: Square line cap.

member.name: F:unvell.D2DLib.D2DCapStyle.Round
member.summary: Round line cap.

member.name: F:unvell.D2DLib.D2DCapStyle.Triangle
member.summary: Triangle line cap.

member.name: F:unvell.D2DLib.D2DTextAntialiasMode.ClearType
member.summary: Creates red and blue artifacts around the letters to make them look smooth.

member.name: F:unvell.D2DLib.D2DTextAntialiasMode.Grayscale
member.summary: Smoothes edges using opacity, no artifacts.

member.name: F:unvell.D2DLib.DWriteMeasuringMode.Natural
member.summary: Text is measured using glyph ideal metrics whose values are independent to the current display resolution.

member.name: F:unvell.D2DLib.DWriteMeasuringMode.GDIClassic
member.summary: Text is measured using glyph display compatible metrics whose values tuned for the current display resolution.

member.name: F:unvell.D2DLib.DWriteMeasuringMode.GDINatural
member.summary: Text is measured using the same glyph display metrics as text measured by GDI using a font created with CLEARTYPE_NATURAL_QUALITY.

member.name: T:unvell.D2DLib.DWriteTextAlignment
member.summary: Alignment of paragraph text along the reading direction axis relative to the leading and trailing edge of the layout box.

member.name: F:unvell.D2DLib.DWriteTextAlignment.Leading
member.summary: The leading edge of the paragraph text is aligned to the layout box's leading edge.

member.name: F:unvell.D2DLib.DWriteTextAlignment.Trailing
member.summary: The trailing edge of the paragraph text is aligned to the layout box's trailing edge.

member.name: F:unvell.D2DLib.DWriteTextAlignment.Center
member.summary: The center of the paragraph text is aligned to the center of the layout box.

member.name: T:unvell.D2DLib.DWriteFontWeight
member.summary: Specifies a member of the font family (such as Arial Black).

member.name: F:unvell.D2DLib.DWriteFontStyle.Oblique
member.summary: Force shears the text without using the italic variation.

member.name: F:unvell.D2DLib.DWriteFontStyle.Italic
member.summary: Uses the italic member of the font family, just as it was designed.

member.name: T:unvell.D2DLib.DWriteParagraphAlignment
member.summary: Alignment of paragraph text along the flow direction axis relative to the flow's beginning and ending edge of the layout box.

member.name: F:unvell.D2DLib.DWriteParagraphAlignment.Near
member.summary: The first line of paragraph is aligned to the flow's beginning edge of the layout box.

member.name: F:unvell.D2DLib.DWriteParagraphAlignment.Far
member.summary: The last line of paragraph is aligned to the flow's ending edge of the layout box.

member.name: F:unvell.D2DLib.DWriteParagraphAlignment.Center
member.summary: The center of the paragraph is aligned to the center of the flow of the layout box.

member.name: F:unvell.D2DLib.LayerOptions.InitializeForClearType
member.summary: The layer will render correctly for ClearType text. If the render target was set to ClearType previously, the layer will continue to render ClearType. If the render target was set to ClearType and this option is not specified, the render target will be set to render gray-scale until the layer is popped. The caller can override this default by calling SetTextAntialiasMode while within the layer. This flag is slightly slower than the default.

member.name: M:unvell.D2DLib.D2DColor.Randomly
member.summary: Create color by randomly color components.
